name: widgames Collection
description:
widgames Collection is a microgame collection that features 50 games that use a variety of input methods and sensors. Use the touch screen, motion controls, microphone and proximity sensor to play a large selection of unique microgames!

Play through Endless mode to get comfortable with the game, then try Challenge mode to really put your skills to the test!

Compete online with other players and aim to be the best player in the world!

More games will be added in the future.

Alternative Google Play download link: Here
